definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

sentences.english: Ambition is alot like love, impatient both of delays and rivals.
sentences.chinese: 壮志雄心和爱情一样，都总是迟到并对对手失去耐心。

sentences.english: Li Yuhe was put into the prison, but his ambition was unchained .
sentences.chinese: 被投入大牢，但他的雄心壮志是关不住的。

sentences.english: They do not realize I can fulfil any ambition.
sentences.chinese: 他们认识不到我会实现任何雄心壮志。

sentences.english: So! I guess I'll be Maverick and you can be Goose.
sentences.chinese: 我会唱你喜欢鹅和小牛的壮志凌云。

sentences.english: Although immensely ambitious, he would never lose touch with his plebeian roots.
sentences.chinese: 尽管拥有雄心壮志，但他从来没有丢失他的草根气节。
壮志雄心地投入到食品营养的研发上。

sentences.english: Ambition and enthusiasm is great auxiliary ji.
sentences.chinese: 壮志与热情是伟业的辅冀。

sentences.english: Her ambitions had shrunk gradually in the desiccating air of failure.
sentences.chinese: 多少雄心壮志已在失败的阴影下逐渐枯竭了。

sentences.english: But that does not mean they are adopting America’s aspirations in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 但是这不意味着他们要在阿富汗效仿美国的雄心壮志。

sentences.english: He is a lazybones with no ambition whatsoever.
sentences.chinese: 他是个懒骨头，一点雄心壮志打死都没有。

sentences.english: At that time we are so magnificent, cherish high aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 那时候的我们是多么的气势恢宏，壮志凌云。

sentences.english: This may require you to think big, but it can be done.
sentences.chinese: 这可能需要雄心壮志，然而是可以做到的。

sentences.english: Ambition is a characteristic of all successful businessmen.
sentences.chinese: 雄心壮志是一切乐成买卖人的配合特点。

sentences.english: By comparison, Alec was the least ambitious man she had ever met.
sentences.chinese: 相比较而言，艾里克是她见到的最没有雄心壮志的人。

sentences.english: He successed because of his ambition and generous spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他成功是因为他的雄心壮志和慷慨的精神。

sentences.english: Success in comedy kindled Mr. Curtis’s ambitions as a dramatic actor.
sentences.chinese: 喜剧片的成功激发了柯蒂斯进军剧情片的雄心壮志。

definition: to dedicate oneself to the service of one's country
to rouse to vigorous action/energetic mood
